mapper.insert:
select PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into product (productcode, productname, standard, outline, usestatus, baseprice,imagecode) values ('P'||#{productCode} ,#{productName} ,#{standard} ,nvl(#{outLine, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null) ,nvl(#{usestatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},1) ,#{basePrice} ,nvl(#{imageCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null))
mapper.select: select productcode, productname, standard, outline, usestatus, baseprice,imagecode from product
select productcode, productname, standard, outline, usestatus, baseprice,imagecode from product where productname like '%' ||#{productName}||'%'
select productcode, productname, standard, outline, usestatus, baseprice,imagecode from product where productcode = #{productCode}
mapper.update: update product set productname = nvl(#{productName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},productname) ,standard = nvl(#{standard, jdbcType=VARCHAR},standard) ,outline = nvl(#{outLine, jdbcType=VARCHAR},outline) ,usestatus = nvl(#{usestatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR},usestatus) ,baseprice = nvl(#{basePrice, jdbcType=VARCHAR},baseprice) ,imagecode = nvl(#{imageCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},imagecode) where productcode = #{productCode}
